TopicTitle: During some launches, all roll/pitch/yaw controls get locked and the vessel cannot be directionally controlled. Only fixable by closing and reopening the game.

Articles.Content: pretty much what the title said, seems to be a easily fixable bug

1 hour ago, JohnnySnap said:

pretty much what the title said, seems to be a easily fixable bug

Sounds like the same thing I encountered. My directional controls swapped with my translate controls. I'll check to see if it's fixed when I play today, don't think I closed the game and reopened last night

Ive figured this one out.

Pressing the del key swaps between flight mode and docking mode. This carry's on from the VAB so if you're deleting parts you are swapping between modes. These modes depends on wether wasdqe is translate or P/Y/R and vice versa.

You can hit del at any point to solve this.
This only seems to happen after first reverting to the VAB and then launching after using the delete key while in the VAB.
